attributes.action: more funding and awareness in eating disorders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to make people more aware of the risks and symptoms of eating disorders and for the prime minister to give more funding to have more treatment for eating disorders nation wide.
I personally have suffered from Anorexia Nervosa for 10 years now and have had t otravel to the other side of the uk to recieve treatment,as there is no limited facilities avaliable nation wide.
With the risk of eating disorders increasing i feel we need more infomation and treatment to help with this illness so people can get on the road of recovery quickly and hopefully have a successful recovery.
please back my petition to get more help fpr eating disorders thank you

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "more funding and awareness in eating disorders."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17578


Prime Minister's Office
